articles.author: Lachlan Forsyth
articles.title: Syria’s seven years of hell: We don’t know how lucky we are
articles.description: OPINION: It would have been so nice to not be writing this. It's so much easier to moan about bike helmet law, or the latest twitter-spat, or how horrific peak-hour traffic is during March.

articles.author: Ioanna Roumeliotis
articles.title: Puerto Rico's misery: Thousands without homes, power 2 months after storms
articles.description: Two months after Hurricane Maria, power is slowly being restored to some parts of the impoverished American territory, but most of the island's 3.5 million people are still living in the dark.

articles.title: growing a minimalist wardrobe: responsible decluttering.

articles.author: Venessa Wong
articles.title: Why I’m No Longer Ashamed To Be Frugal
articles.description: I’m deeply self-conscious when other people notice my careful spending. But my family has come a long way to give me what I have and so I've learned to embrace my thriftiness. View Entire Post ›

articles.author: Kate
articles.title: Israeli forces kill Palestinian protester in Gaza with missile fired from armed drone
articles.description: Palestinian medical sources have reported that an armed Israeli military drone fired a missile at Palestinian protesters near Erez Crossing on Wednesday killing Mojahed Nabil al-Khodary, 23, from Gaza City.
